about_the_game:
When Ragnarok came, the battle of the Gods and Titans rocked the earth. But neither side emerged victorious. All fell at the hands of The Necromancer... never to return. While once, we took for granted our strange revival, now a permanent death is becoming almost normal. The strong are always the first to fall – what a waste…

Fight the Necromancer’s disciples in a flurry of bow and arrow!
Give them the death they deserve!
Bring them to justice!

The time to mourn is gone. Now is the time to fight!

Features


BLOOD MAGIC: BLEED PAST YOUR LIMITATIONS

Fight fearsome foes to discover new spells and mimic their powers!
Blood Magic allows elves to take on the abilities of other creatures.
Adapt your playstyle by using different combinations for endless possibilities!

BATTLE TO THE DEATH!

Shoot your way through hordes of adversaries and terrifying beasts! (30 bosses planned for full release, all with unique mechanics and attacks!)
Enjoy responsive controls and a unique bow-slinging playstyle!

COLLECTIBLES

Discover strange items strewn across the nine realms!
Where do they lead? Only one way to find out...

SECRETS AND LORE

Discover secret rooms! Secret items! Secret bosses! Secret everything! (Ok maybe that’s too much)
Unearth the real truth and learn the dark history of the world around you.

ATMOSPHERE


Playful with dark undertones. Dark with playful undertones? Who even knows?
But hey! This is a one man team, so the lore, art, music, and fights are all designed by one guy, ensuring a coherent feel and atmosphere for each region!

name: Eternal Reckoning

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel (R) Core(TM) i7-6600U
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel (R) HD Graphics 520
  • Storage: 350 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: (we understand that the available space requirement may be confusing. This is simply because the game files are very small)

short_description: Eternal Reckoning is an action-packed Metroidvania following the story of an elf taking their revenge for the atrocities of Ragnarok. Slay a wide range of dangerous bosses! Explore a world full of secrets and rich mythology-inspired lore!
